<b style="font-size:40px;"><i>Welcome to HelpJobs!</i></b>

<img src="data/joblogo2.png" style="width:70%;margin-bottom:4px;"><br>

HelpJobs is a Shiny Application which aims to help you job hunters <b><i>better understand Singapore's job market more comprehensively</i></b>. It allows for easier visualization of the job market scene, and includes <b>features</b> such as:
<ul>
<li> Finding out the most popular skills companies look for in individuals </li>
<li> Comparing the salary distribution between various industries </li>
<li> Job demand and cycle effects </li>
<li> Universities and their respective salaries </li>
</ul>
and so much more!<br>
Whether you're a fresh grad looking for a job, someone looking to make a career switch or someone trying to plan their education and career, HelpJobs has something for you!
<br>
